last_episode_to_air.name: Guitar Zeroes
last_episode_to_air.overview: When Sanjay and Craig are offered to play at the Punk Pit, they seek a guitar legend known as KOR.

name: Sanjay and Craig
overview: Sanjay and Craig is an American animated television series produced by Nickelodeon. The show is about a 12-year-old boy named Sanjay Patel who owns a talking pet snake named Craig.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: The series follows the exploits of the title characters, a 12-year-old boy named Sanjay Patel, and his best friend, an anthropomorphic snake named Craig. On a promotional webpage for the show, the network explains that Sanjay and Craig's suburban hijinks require that "no one finds out that Craig can talk".

episodes.name: Brett Venom, M.D.
episodes.overview: Sanjay and Craig, upon hearing that Sanjay's mother is about to help in a "butt transplant", try to sneak into the hospital to view it. They disguise themselves as doctors and discover that the patient is Mr. Noodman, their neighbor who is terrified of snakes (Craig is a snake) and he then causes panic throughout the hospital before Sanjay's mother successfully completes the surgery.

episodes.name: Laugh Quake
episodes.overview: Sanjay and Craig both find their laughs are annoying, so they go to a comedy club in an attempt to find a more pleasing laugh

episodes.name: Maximum Dennis
episodes.overview: The boys disguise themselves as Maximum Dennis at the Frycade, where they intend to defend their video-game records.

episodes.name: Dog Wave
episodes.overview: The boys want a dog, but wind up with 100 dogs. Although when Mr. Noodman calls the pound it is up to the boys to rescue them.

episodes.name: Heightmare
episodes.overview: Sanjay is finally tall enough to ride what he believes to be the scariest ride at the carnival, but he may not be able to go through with it

episodes.name: Be Like Tufflips
episodes.overview: Sanjay is mistaken for his hero when he dresses up as Remington Tufflips, and he gets all of his advantages of being him.

episodes.name: Stinkboy
episodes.overview: Sanjay runs away to live in the sewer when Craig can't handle his stench.

episodes.name: Wolfie
episodes.overview: Hector's sudden fascination with wolves gets on Sanjay and Craig's nerves.

episodes.name: Traffical Island
episodes.overview: Sanjay strands his pals on a highway median, and everyone gets upset during the experience.

episodes.name: Partybot
episodes.overview: Sanjay and Craig become party animals when they hang out with an old robot invented by Vijay, but chaos ensues when the Partybot goes insane.

episodes.name: The Giving G
episodes.overview: The boys find a giant gorilla balloon at the dump that used to belong to "Big G Tires." Unfortunately, the Dicksons also want it.

episodes.name: Release the Craigan
episodes.overview: When Craig steals Megan's identity, he becomes a beauty pageant queen, making Megan depressed.

episodes.name: Muscle C.O.P.S.
episodes.overview: Sanjay and Craig grow giant muscles, join an unusual police force known as the Muscle C.O.P.S. and learn a valuable lesson on teamwork.

episodes.name: Cold Hard Cash
episodes.overview: Sanjay and Craig find a 100-dollar bill in the ice. But the problem is, Baby Richard Dickson wants it as well.

episodes.name: Unbarfable
episodes.overview: Sanjay and Craig learn that Hector has never barfed in his entire life, so they try to make him puke.

episodes.name: Game On
episodes.overview: Sanjay and Craig's favorite video game, Tufflips Thumbs-Up Karate, is mysteriously gone from the Frycade.

episodes.name: Laked Nake
episodes.overview: Sanjay loses his bathing suit while at the lake, and Tyson tries to show him to everyone in order to ruin his life.

episodes.name: Doom Baby
episodes.overview: Sanjay and Craig decide to baby-sit Richard Dickson. But things get crazy when he sneaks into Noodman's house.

episodes.name: Blackout
episodes.overview: Sanjay tries to give an electric charger to his mother during a blackout. The problem is, everyone else wants it.

episodes.name: Family Re-Noodman
episodes.overview: The boys sneak into Noodman's family reunion to sample a new Frycade wing recipe.

episodes.name: Fart Baby
episodes.overview: Sanjay becomes pregnant with a fart after holding one in to avoid farting in front of Belle Pepper.

episodes.name: Kung-Fu Catapult
episodes.overview: After playing Safari Food Fight with Megan, Sanjay and Craig discover a haunted trailer and agree to rid Tufflip's trailer, haunted by ghosts in search for a catapult.

episodes.name: Road Pizza
episodes.overview: Craig gets obsessed with pizza. Then, he gets possessed by an evil pizza demon when he eats a slice.

episodes.name: Trouble Dare
episodes.overview:
Sanjay and Craig accidentally infest the house with an ant farm and decide to stay in a trailer. Unfortunately, the Dicksons are staying in it, so they have to play against them in a Family Double Dare game show.

Special guest stars: Marc Summers and John Harvey as themselves.

episodes.name: You're in Trouble
episodes.overview: The gang go to the Tufflips camp. But Sanjay and Craig decide to not drink for the journey to avoid wetting the bed during the night.

episodes.name: Cup O'Universe
episodes.overview: The kids are convinced that there is a universe in an old milkshake cup.

episodes.name: Booger Johnson
episodes.overview: Megan forces Sanjay to take care of her pet gerbil, Booger Johnson, while she's away. But since Craig has an appetite for gerbils, Sanjay tries to get him to see Booger Johnson as a friend.

episodes.name: Dream Rangers
episodes.overview: Sanjay and Craig must re-enter their dream to rescue Belle from Noodman.

episodes.name: Prickerbeast
episodes.overview: The gang is lied to by their parents about the urban legend of the Prickerbeast, so they vow revenge.

episodes.name: Day of the Snake
episodes.overview: Craig lies to Sanjay about what his day is like while Sanjay is away at school.

episodes.name: Old Farts
episodes.overview: After finding out that seniors get free wings at the Frycade, Sanjay and Craig disguise themselves as seniors.

episodes.name: Kerplunk'd
episodes.overview:
Sanjay and Craig plan on starting a web-show where they prank others, based on Raska's hit web-show. Problems arise and a prank war breaks out between Sanjay and Craig and Raska.

Special guest stars: Adam DeVine as Raska Boosh.

episodes.name: Flip Flopas
episodes.overview:
The kids find some rare candies at Hector's house known as Flip Flopas, but when they discover a trick behind the candies, they seek and antidote.

Special guest stars: Sam Lavagnino as Munchie.

episodes.name: Chill Bill
episodes.overview:
When the boys come across an underground convenience store known as "Eezy P-Eezy," they soon meet Chill Bill, an electric bass player. Craig soon starts hanging out with Chill Bill, making Sanjay jealous.

Special guest stars: Michael-Leon Wooley as Chill Bill.

episodes.name: Curb Dawgz
episodes.overview: Sanjay, Craig and Hector, the "Curb Dawgz", disguise themselves as rad skateboarders, hoping to join a skateboarding crew.

episodes.name: Susan Loogie
episodes.overview: Megan disguises herself as a tomboy to convince Sanjay to be her dance partner.

episodes.name: Pretty in Punk
episodes.overview: The Dicksons' band is transformed by a music agent for the worse, and it's Sanjay and Craig's fault.

episodes.name: Hot Sauce Boss
episodes.overview: Chicken Chuck puts his own hot sauce in the Frycade wings and is kicked out, but starts his own wing restaurant.

episodes.name: A Tail of Two Slithers
episodes.overview: When Craig's long-lost brother, Ronnie Slithers, takes him away, Sanjay goes to extreme measures to get Craig back. Meanwhile, Ronnie uses devious methods to break-up Sanjay and Craig. When Sanjay sneaks into Ronnie's house to save Craig, Ronnie and his security try to stop them by using shovels, but when Sanjay tells Ronnie he doesn't have to be alone, the securities stop throwing things, at the end, Ronnie learns his lesson, Craig opens up to Sanjay's parents and tells them that he can talk, but they knew he could talk a long time ago.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: The series follows the exploits of the title characters, a 12-year-old boy named Sanjay Patel, and his best friend, an anthropomorphic snake named Craig. On a promotional webpage for the show, the network explains that Sanjay and Craig's suburban hijinks require that "no one finds out that Craig can talk".

episodes.name: Boatin' Down the River
episodes.overview: The children set off to find mysterious castaways that are stranded on an island shaped like a butt.

episodes.name: Ghost Pool
episodes.overview: The gang sets off to find a legendary pool in the forest with Belle babysitting to prove they are not babies.

episodes.name: Shirts Off
episodes.overview: Sanjay and Craig experience freedom when they are shirtless.

episodes.name: Middle Shame
episodes.overview: Craig helps Sanjay to reveal his goofy middle name.

episodes.name: Dolled Up
episodes.overview: Sanjay goes to great lengths to conceal that he and Craig were using Darlene's makeup kit.

episodes.name: Space Race
episodes.overview: Sanjay takes credit on Craig's invention and Craig goes to top him off with another invention.

episodes.name: Barfy's Babies
episodes.overview: Sanjay and Craig try to find something Barfy's new baby is good at.

episodes.name: Butts Up
episodes.overview: Sanjay meets a girl named Sam, and helps her win a "Butts Up" game against Noodman.

episodes.name: Screamday
episodes.overview: Craig loses his voice while screaming too much, so Sanjay, Megan, and Hector must get it back.

episodes.name: Enter Sandman
episodes.overview: The Dicksons invite Sanjay and Craig over, only to discover that their lives are totally different than their lives.

episodes.name: Alien Craig
episodes.overview: When Sanjay forgets to take out the garbage, a trip to the dump turns into a journey of galactic proportions.

episodes.name: Googas
episodes.overview: The kids are desperate to get the most popular toy in town, but their attempts are thwarted by the snobby Benji Warlin.

episodes.name: Glory Hounds
episodes.overview: The boys get Megan kicked out of her prestigious club for winners.

episodes.name: Glad to Be Sad
episodes.overview: Sanjay and Craig hear a sad song that makes them feel better.

episodes.name: Remington Tufflips' Spooky Trailer of Cartoon
episodes.overview: Tufflips tells 5 Halloween stories in this episode. They are "Eye Scream", "Haus of Vings", "Haunted Milk", "Hook'd" and "Poultrygeist".

episodes.name: TuffCon
episodes.overview: Sanjay meets his favorite movie villain, but finds the actor to be devious in reality.

episodes.name: Pet Parents
episodes.overview: Sanjay and Craig find a way to hypnotize Darlene and Vijay.

episodes.name: 2 Tuff 2 Watch
episodes.overview: The kids host an overnight Tufflips movie marathon in order to save a reptile refuge, but have trouble staying awake during it.

episodes.name: Cuddle Buddy
episodes.overview: Craig longs to be cuddled after seeing the other neighborhood pets receiving affection.

episodes.name: Ting
episodes.overview: The children try to imagine the purpose of a mysterious object.

episodes.name: Fartwerk
episodes.overview: Sanjay and Craig seek to create a symphony of farts, and one person holds the one they desperately need: Noodman.

episodes.name: Rash Thrash
episodes.overview: Sanjay finds out to be allergic to Craig, only to find out the cure is wing sauce.

episodes.name: Fowl Work
episodes.overview: Sanjay and Craig must keep Belle's after work partying a secret from Penny.

episodes.name: Wild Buds
episodes.overview: Sanjay and Craig make a bet about who can survive in the wild longer.

episodes.name: Depants Tag
episodes.overview: The town plays a game involving pantsing people for a grand prize.

episodes.name: Ew De Hector
episodes.overview: Hector sells his sweat as cologne.

episodes.name: King of Kids
episodes.overview: Sanjay and Craig meet a group of young children who idolize the duo.

episodes.name: Romper Chomper
episodes.overview: Megan loses her teeth in a bicycle accident and can't find them, becoming convinced someone has stolen them.

episodes.name: Conquistador
episodes.overview: Sanjay and Craig discover a statue of a golden conquistador in Darlene's old room, but soon discover it is haunted.

episodes.name: Chewhuahuas
episodes.overview: Sanjay and his friends try to stop a small group of rabid Chihuahuas from following them.

episodes.name: Space Invaders
episodes.overview: Sanjay, Craig, and Megan try to stop Hector's close-talking tendencies.

episodes.name: D.I.N.K.
episodes.overview: Vijay gets a new high-tech car, much to Sanjay and Craig's dismay.

episodes.name: Dangerous Debbie
episodes.overview: A love-smitten Craig kidnaps an electric eel from the tank of a sushi restaurant.

episodes.name: Serpentco
episodes.overview: Sanjay and Craig find out that somebody is making bootleg DVDs of Tufflips' movies and go undercover with Tufflips find out who the culprit is.

episodes.name: Chrome Dome
episodes.overview: A billboard of a giant-headed lawyer gets blown by the wind. The boys set out to look for it with the help of the lawyer whom it belongs, while at the same time they try to tolerate his loud voice.

episodes.name: Flabyrinth
episodes.overview: Sanjay and Craig win a visit to a local Tufflips Labyrinth, only to be betrayed by Android Jim.

episodes.name: Snake Parts Unknown
episodes.overview: Craig becomes obsessed over Anthony Gourmand, who hosts the TV show "Foodventurer." Sanjay and Craig find him at the Frycade, where he's looking for the "ultimate" food. They are convinced that they will find it in the town, so they eat the local cuisine. However, Anthony Gourmand thinks the "ultimate" food is Craig. Sanjay has to rescue Craig from being eaten.

episodes.name: Street Dogg
episodes.overview: A rapper called Street Dogg moves next door to Sanjay and Craig to escape the stress of celebrity life. The duo later discovers that he was formerly in a rap duo with Tufflips. So the kids try to reunite them, but it all leads up to an epic rap battle.

episodes.name: And Justice for Durdle
episodes.overview: When Noodman tries one of Farmer Larry's "Blueberry Smoobbies", he discovers that it is actually dog vomit. Due to this, Noodman files a lawsuit against Farmer Larry. If Noodman wins, Farmer Larry could lose Blueberry Farm and his dogs. Farmer Larry is offered lawyers who are actually Sanjay and Craig in disguise.

episodes.name: Beauty and the Beard
episodes.overview: When Penny and Belle have a plumbing problem, Sanjay offers them to stay at his house. However, Darlene and Vijay want Belle to see a video. Sanjay must keep Belle upstairs because he thinks that the video is embarrassing.

episodes.name: Hot Heads
episodes.overview: The kids try to reach Heat Nirvana level to experience the coolness of Lake Lundgren

episodes.name: Lundgren Loner
episodes.overview: Sanjay tries to spend a whole afternoon alone at home without Craig, Vijay, and Darlene.

episodes.name: Bike-o Psycho
episodes.overview: Sanjay and Craig find an abandoned bike, but they must deal with Chido, the original owner who wants it back.

episodes.name: Boulder Rollers
episodes.overview: Sanjay, Hector, and Megan try to push a giant boulder down the lake, while Craig tries to prove that Magnetic Snakes are real.

episodes.name: Galaxy Geeks
episodes.overview: The epic 'Alien Craig' fantasy space adventure continues with Noodman joining the children on a new mission.

episodes.name: Freaks + Cheeks
episodes.overview: When Sanjay and Craig petsit Sweet Cheeks, a coyote unexpectedly breaks into the house.

episodes.name: Guitar Zeroes
episodes.overview: When Sanjay and Craig are offered to play at the Punk Pit, they seek a guitar legend known as KOR.

episodes.name: Heartyface
episodes.overview: Craig gets obsessed with gaining popularity on a social media site called "Heartyface".

episodes.name: Huggle Day
episodes.overview:
After ruining Lundgren's Huggle Day celebration, Sanjay and Craig set out to right their wrong, with the help of movie hero and town founder Dolph Lundgren, as they journey to find Huggle Bunny and discover the true meaning of Huggle Day.

Guest star: Dolph Lundgren as himself.

episodes.name: Dude Snake Nood
episodes.overview: Sanjay and Craig are forced to go on a play date with Noodman's nephew, Randy

episodes.name: Barrel Boyz
episodes.overview: Tufflips recruits Vijay to help him pull off his greatest stunt: going over Lundgren's Butt Rock Falls in a wooden barrel.

episodes.name: All Night Bummer Party
episodes.overview: Sanjay and Craig celebrate their "friend-iversary" at a Frycade sleepover event, but the night doesn't go as Sanjay plans. Chido then convinces Sanjay to turn against Craig.

episodes.name: Partybot Returns
episodes.overview: Vijay reprograms Partybot into an Artybot to showcase at Bertha Van Weld's tech expo.

episodes.name: Paper Pushers
episodes.overview: Noodman tries to uncover Sanjay and Craig's racket of keeping money for newspapers they don't deliver.

episodes.name: Bros of a Feather
episodes.overview: Sanjay and Craig find an orphaned baby bird and decide to care for it.

episodes.name: Ain't No Fang
episodes.overview: Sanjay is accidentally bitten and envenomed by Craig. Almost unable to move, he's taught how to live as a snake by Craig.

episodes.name: Balzalderac!
episodes.overview: Sanjay and Craig actually live their roles as fantasy heroes in Season 12 foretold in "King of Kids", in order to save the world and the time continuum.

episodes.name: Master Smashers
episodes.overview: Sanjay and Craig help Vijay with clearing his warehouse of old junk, but there's a misunderstanding.

episodes.name: All Couped Up
episodes.overview: Sanjay and Craig disguise themselves as Mick Mucus in order to win a car in an endurance contest.

episodes.name: The Sanjay and Craig Stunt School Special"
episodes.overview: When Craig joins Sanjay at stuntman school, he finds that his best bud is living in the shadow of Stasi Stuntman, an academic overachiever. Craig then encourages a reluctant Sanjay to compete against Stasi for a chance to become Tufflips' new sidekick.

episodes.name: Combo Attack
episodes.overview: Megan befriends Chido and forms a band with her called "Character Select", but struggles to keep their friendship and band a secret.

episodes.name: Stuffed Curse Pizza
episodes.overview: After failing to summon King Za, Sanjay is convinced that he is cursed.

episodes.name: Quietude Dudes
episodes.overview: When Darlene has had a bad day from work, Sanjay and Craig try to be as quiet as they can so she could get some rest.

episodes.name: Diaper Dinks
episodes.overview: When Sanjay, Craig, Hector, and Megan all revert into babies after eating baby food, they join in with Baby Richard Dickson to live like a baby. They then later discover that Baby Richard is turing everybody in Lundgren into babies and making them their slaves.

episodes.name: Halloweenies
episodes.overview: The gang wishes every day was Halloween, so they decide to make it happen.

episodes.name: G.U.T.S. Busters
episodes.overview:
Sanjay, Craig, and Sam compete in a national tour of the Nickelodeon GUTS game show.

Guest stars: Mike O'Malley and Moira "Mo" Quirk as themselves.

episodes.name: Man of Squeal
episodes.overview: When Vijay is identified as "The Pig Man", he goes back to his old pig-training days, but the obsession gets out of hand.

episodes.name: Songjay
episodes.overview: Sanjay and Craig appeal to the people of Lundgren to watch the appearance of a rare double-comet.

episodes.name: Friend Card
episodes.overview: An old rivalry between Darlene and Noodman is reignited when Sanjay and Craig discover a Friend Card.

episodes.name: Beach Butts
episodes.overview: When Sanjay and Craig agree to buy a present for Vijay, they get distracted and chill at the beach.

episodes.name: JJ and Greg
episodes.overview: Sanjay and Craig become best buds with another dude-reptile duo, until they start to take over their lives.

episodes.name: Tuff Rider
episodes.overview: The kids try to recruit Tufflips for their bicycle gang, but upon learning that he cannot ride a bike, they dedicate themselves to teaching him.

episodes.name: Space Train to Space
episodes.overview: Dillinger Softlips steals a bunch of alien dinosaur eggs and it's up to Tufflips and a baby dinosaur named Pepe to stop him.

episodes.name: The Snake Pit
episodes.overview: Sanjay and Craig's friendship gets tested when Craig turns the attic into his personal party zone.

episodes.name: Booyah for Bollywood
episodes.overview: When the Patels take a family vacation to India, Sanjay and Craig get to star as extras in a new Tufflips movie being directed by Ronnie, who gets into a breakdown when his brother's relationship with Sanjay stresses him out. Meanwhile, Vijay tries to show Darlene his favorite childhood places in India, only to discover that most of it had changed.
